评论详情: I don’t usually have good luck shopping on line.  Nothing ever feels or looks great on me in my opinion.  This dress is super comfortable and I love how it looks!  My sister tried it on and it looks great on her too!  I’m 5’8” and she’s 5’3” so that’s saying a lot!
Nice material & is flattering on the body.I ordered a medium.
Very pretty.
This dress is absolutely perfect in every way! The fit, fabric, and look are exactly what I was looking for.

The blue velvet color was pretty, however the material is thin and it smells terrible. The dress was delivered in a small zippered plastic bag which I’ve received with many Amazon orders. This dress smells like mold and it’s brand new. I could wash it but I’m afraid the smell would not come out. Absolutely awful. I must return it.
This dress exceeded my expectations. I wore it for my family Christmas photos and it photographed beautifully. It’s also comfortable and TTS. I also loved the color and quality of the velvet detail.
The length hit me weird and the sleeves were not flattering. Very pretty dress, but felt like a nightgown.

I bought this dress for a fall wedding and it was perfect! The dress fit perfectly and was not too long. It looked very nice in person and I got lots of compliments. I always wanted a velvet dress and this one did not disappoint!

评论概述: True to size beautiful dress. Material is velvety and has good waist stretch.  Wore to a wedding
评论详情: True to size .  Beautiful soft velvety fabric. The waist has good stretch if needed.  Wore to a wedding.

This dress is very similar to the pictures in color and style, but I was disappointed there was no slit in the front of the dress as the pictures show. The waist band also has multiple bunched layers, making the dress heavier than necessary. The fit is flattering and elegant, but I am still on the fence on whether I will keep it or not.

Just as described. I am 5’4” and love the length. The burned out pattern is really pretty. The material is lightweight. Overall, very happy with this dress. It will be perfect for Christmas in Florida.
The quality of it is very nice for the money, it’s a beautiful dress , the pictures don’t do it justice, it’s perfect for fall going into Christmas time , it’s flattering and comfortable
Soft and fits just right.
fits as expected. I'm 5'2" and it just brushes the floor on me when barefoot.

评论概述: Not like the picture - very cheap!
评论详情: This didn't look anything like the picture - I was shocked at how cheap and costume like this dress was. I got the green one. It looked like something from Shrek the Musical. I cannot believe this is the price it is - wouldn't have looked twice at it if it was in store. Do not recommend.

评论概述: Great fabric but it looked frumpy on me.
评论详情: Not flattering in Xl
It's exacy as described ! Comfy but beautiful!

I ordered 6 dresses to try on and this one was the best. I love the true emerald green colour. The fot is also very flattering. I have an hourglass figure and a tummy. The dress is flattering over the stomach area. Would recommend it

I  was invited for the wedding and preparing for 2 months for buying lots of dresses. I tried my luck here in amazon and bought it. Received it the following day and wore it the next day. It was gorgeous and the color is just right for the wedding. Thank you for this dress and for fast shipping!!! It is true to size and the color and design looks fab!
Love this style. Color is perfect for year round, but especially for fall and winter. Can dress it up or down. True to size.

Discovered at the last minute a wedding we are invited to is black tie optional, so I had to up my dress game. Amazon to the rescue! This dress is both comfortable AND cute plus fits the bill for this formal event at a fantastic price point though it is flexible enough to dress down for other occasions. That's a win all around! Flattering to all body types and fantastic for the holidays, put this in your shopping cart now!
The dress was beautiful and of good quality material. Unfortunately, it was tight across my chest. I am a 38D, 175lbs & 5’6”.
This dress is beautiful and comfortable, great quality

I love this dress! It’s beautiful. It’s comfortable and it’s flattering. I plan on wearing it to a fall wedding and it’s perfect for that. I normally wear a size 16 and I bought the extra large and it fits perfectly.
This dress is beautiful and comfortable. The velvet is soft and warm perfect for fall. I am 5’2 so the dress is a bit longer on me but it doesn’t drag on the floor.

评论概述: A bit roomy for the sizing, but still lovely
评论详情: This A-line velvet burnout dress was a little bigger than expected…not much just a little.  I probably should have gotten the medium.  Anyway, the fabric is very nice and I like the way the shoulders hang.  I guess if I changed anything it would be the bulkiness of the waist.  I think it makes my waist look a little bigger due to the extra fabric gathered there.  Other than that, it’s a beautiful dress.

评论概述: Did not fit my shorter frame
评论详情: I'm 5'4.5", around 130lbs, C34 chest and I felt like this dress was made for someone with a longer torso. Returned it as I bought it for a fall wedding and wanted something that fit better.

评论概述: Beautiful Dress that is Soft & Comfortable!
评论详情: I ordered this V neck maxi dress to wear this coming Christmas to our Christmas party at church. This dress is pretty and unique and that is what drew me to it and why I eventually ordered it. This dress is really soft & comfortable, it is made out of velvet like material and to me the fabric is medium to slightly heavy weight. This dress has an imperial waist, side slit & the shiny looking places on the dress are considered burnout places. This dress fits according to the size chart provided. You can wash this at home in cold water and hang to dry. I recommend this dress to others.

This velvet maxi dress is very beautiful and elegant. It has short sleeves. I love how it sits on the waist and has a slit on the side. It is very comfortable and soft to wear. It is perfect to wear at any formal party, night outs or any other formal or semi formal occasion. Would recommend having this in your closet.

This is a beautiful dress - the material is simply lovely - but it is important to size for your largest, er, asset because there is not a lot of stretch. (There is a bit, just not a lot.) According to the chart, my waist is a Medium while by chest is an XL; I split the difference and went with the L. I should have gone with the XL because while the dress fits loosely around the middle, the chest is on the tighter side and being that it is an empire waist... well, it looks weird on me. On the right body type, this would be an absolutely gorgeous dress - and look just so stunning. The dress itself is well made, with nice even stitches and clean lines; there just isn't a lot of give in it for curvier figures.
It shows your stomach. I’m 5 months post postpartum and I had to send it back. It was too tight in my stomach but fit everywhere else nicely.
